title: Generative & Evolving NPC Traits
description: Games feel scripted. Most have the traits of players and NPCs hard coded, limiting natural character development, novelty and replayability.
solution: Onchain characters are becoming a reality, but only by introducing generative and evolving metadata will gameplay improve. We are doing so.
experience: Mix together an established digital artist, an NFT collector/advisor, a sprinkling of tokenomics, and a heaping of developer power.
